name: Work In Progress: A Tale of Depression
name_original: Work In Progress: A Tale of Depression
description:
DO NOT RUN IN FULLSCREEN: the game is meant to be run in the window given.

Play through a typical day through the eyes of someone suffering from depression. Manage your stamina throughout the day, and see if you can make it through the day without having a breakdown. Complete with the ever un-warranted internal dialogue poking and prodding at the back of your mind. CW: Contains things that may cause unease for those suffering from a mental illness.
